name: Weak Santa
description:
All art and code made in 48 hours for the 2019 Yogscast Game Jam

Santa's getting too old he needs his elf to help him deliver presents.

CONTROLS:

  • Click to move elf. Bring him back to Santa to restock on presents.
  • WASD to move Santa (Don't let the kids get to him)

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Christmas Rap" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Thanks for checking out my game :)
